name: opengento/module-document-widget
description: This module aims to help merchants to manage easily their documents on the Magento 2 storefront.

suggest.opengento/module-document-product-link: This module aims to help merchants to link their documents to products in Magento 2.
suggest.opengento/module-document-product-search: This module aims to make documents searchable with product keywords in Magento 2.
suggest.opengento/module-document-search: This module aims to make documents searchable for customers in Magento 2.
suggest.opengento/module-document-restrict: This module aims to restrict documents by type in Magento 2.
